attributes.action: deny Mrs. Thatcher a state burial on the occasion of her death.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The signatories to this petition believe that the UK is still suffering from the effects of Mrs. Thatcher's period in office, that whole communities remain in tatters as a consequence of her policies, that few social ills can not be laid at her door, and that it would be an insult to the British people to accord her a state funeral.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
